meanings.definition: A loud, festive gathering or party.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we had a pardee with music and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood pardee was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent3: The pardee got so loud that even the neighbors joined in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The pardee was a colorful explosion of happiness and celebration.
meanings.sent5: The pardee was so lively, it felt like a burst of confetti in the air.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or delight.
meanings.sent1: Pardee! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: Pardee! That joke really caught me off guard.
meanings.sent4: Pardee! It was like a spark of joy in a dull day.
meanings.sent5: Pardee! The unexpected gift brought a smile to my face.
